mapper.select: SELECT discuss_id,discuss_body,discuss_time,b.blog_id ,b.blog_title,u.user_id,u.user_name FROM discuss d LEFT JOIN blog b on d.blog_id = b.blog_id LEFT JOIN user u on d.user_id = u.user_id WHERE b.blog_state = 1 ORDER BY d.discuss_time DESC LIMIT 0, #{value}
